Event Radar

Instead of data producers owning event instrumentation, let your data consumers define what they want from the end-user with Event Radar and Event Registry. Centralized software to define, debug and deploy events to production.

Automatic instrumentation

Simplify the process with which Mobile and Web engineers communicate with your Data teams. Switch to either Codeless events or Codegen events which will ensure that events always remain consistent.

Data Quality

Automatically detect data quality issues with your instrumentation in your data warehouse. Fine-tunable thresholds for missing metadata, anomaly detection.

Single Client SDK

Single Client SDK that works across Google Analytics, Amplitude, Adobe Analytics or your own existing instrumentation.

Events Maintenance

Integrates with your software development process to make it easy to develop, test, deprecate and maintain events. Git-hooks and CI/CD integration to ensure events never break.

UI Trigger tests

Automatic UI testing across all platforms to test for missing triggers, metadata or uninstremented UI components.

No migration needed

Fix your messy events and keep your existing schema without disrupting your existing data consumers.

Terabytes> Simplify Logging
